channel.title: Sendmessage if ags drop?
channel.description:
Hello, I have a question.
How do i add if player is in [code](absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3227 && absY >= 3201 && absY <= 3235)[/code] and drop is 35 (ags) says. sM("Armadyl Godsword drop!");
to all players that are in [code](absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3227 && absY >= 3201 && absY <= 3235)[/code]
pelase help me! , thanks
